attributes.title: DISGUSTING 🤢🤢
attributes.review: I think I may have gone blind from this app. I already need glasses because I’m going blind but no I just think I am blind. I opened this app to see this orange shrimp and I threw up. I think you need to fix the looks. Because that man is ugly. 🤢🤢

attributes.title: Destroyed My Phone
attributes.review: Words can’t describe how awful this app is. When I downloaded it, it immediately gave my phone a virus and shut it down completely. Would not recommend 👎🏻

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: Not good at all it’s a really bad app it doesn’t work how I thought it will if I could I’ll give it 0/5 really bad app 😡😡I don’t have no more to say but if your President work harder on your app 😡. Really bad app take this app down 😑

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I got this app because my parents wanted me to download it because we’re Americans 💯 but the app didn’t want to download! How rude, honestly very disappointed. I wanted to be a REAL amurican but my phone simply said, “NOT TODAY!!” The end.

attributes.title: So bad!
attributes.review:
This app kept crashing, and keeps sending me notifications. I thought this would be SO HELPFUL TO SHOW SUPPORT TO MY LORD AND SAVIOR TRUMP. but i couldn't even open it! Plus, I really thought there would be even more resources to MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN. But there wasn't any!!

Very sad.

attributes.title: most unorganized app
attributes.review: I got this to keep up w Trump and all of his silly rallies, but the app crashes so much. It always glitches and doesn’t let me tap on things. I do not recommend, it is not helpful at all.

attributes.title: Not good.
attributes.review: Immediately after I opened the app my whole phone just crashed. After I unlocked my phone, some of my apps somehow got deleted. Please don’t get this app it could be hacking us.

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: this is a horrible app that should be taken down!! i’ve downloaded to see what it was like and it always glitches and definitely has bugs. WASTE OF TIME

attributes.title: tried
attributes.review: i tried to use this app, it crashes everytime i open it. i was simply trying to put my number in on the first screen and it wouldn't even give me time to do that without crashing. i also made my phone super slow for some reason, i'm not sure why. idk about the other negative reviews that seem to do it for tik tok, this app is just a genuinely awful experience for me.

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app or whatever and let’s just say i do not recommend. i expected at least a little something from this app and that “little something” i expected was not delivered. 10/10 don’t recommend. it’s very confusing and the first thing you see when you go into the app is an 🍊. a complete turn off for the app as a whole. thank you for your time.
